I played this game without reading reviews\, or visiting this website. I've since discovered the highly polarised response on line. I'm not surprised. I urge you to ignore all of these and play this game to experience what it is. Sadly\, I think many of the negative reviews reflect game fans inability to accept female or LGBT story influences. There were intense moments when I wanted this game to be over\, or that something that was about to happen wouldn't. I felt emotionally drained at times and struggled to sleep when I played it too late.However\, I knew I was going to play to the end. I may never play it again but it will make all other games pale in comparison. Without being too over the top\, it is more than a game. It shows the potential for what games can accomplish\, in a more impactful way than other media. I can't spoil it for you but it is truly innovative in the way it confronts you with its story. I've literally just finished so need time to process. But Naughty Dog have excelled themselves and brought the PS4 to a high point.… Expand
